unbbayes.datamining.classifiers
Class Classifier

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--unbbayes.datamining.classifiers.Classifier
Direct Known Subclasses:
BayesianLearning, DecisionTreeLearning
public abstract class Classifier
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract classifier. All schemes for numeric or nominal prediction extends this class.

Version:
$1.0 $ (17/02/2002)
Author:
Mário Henrique Paes Vieira (mariohpv@bol.com.br)
